data.name: Failrunner13
data.text: Sweet! I have an Odroid XU4 with Retropie and Kodi installed. I have it set up to a projector with a 100‚Äù screen. I had a Chromecast hooked up to it but I wanted retro gaming on my screen. My Samsung phone can do what this app does with the official Kore app but on with the Kodi remote app on ios. So I downloaded this to get the same functionality. It works! I honestly only cast youtube, youtube music, and rarely Plex. This app is not going to give you the full Chromecast experience but for me it‚Äôs perfect due to my casual use.
data.title: Turned my Odroid XU4 into a Chromecast!
